oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Framed photograph of Col. George Washington McKenzie, 5th Tenn. Cav. Regt., CSA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Framed post-war photograph of Col. George Washington McKenzie, 5th Tenn. Cav. Regt., CSA. McKenzie was from Meigs County, Tennessee and served in the 5th Tenn. Inf. in the Mexican War. He was active in Civil War veterans activities after the war. The 5th was raised amongst pro-Confederates in Southeast Tennessee. They skirmished in East Tennessee and Kentucky until July 1863 when they joined the Army of Tennessee. They remained with Wheeler's Cavalry Corps until the surrender in North Carolina.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: McKenzie, George Washington
